Toggle.description:
A toggle value, the toggle is on way communicated device,
For example wall light switches with 433 RF that can turn on or off
but there is no way to know the real light status if someone changes the light status using physical switch.

Switch.description:
A switch status.
 Used for simple devices that can be turned on or off. *and minion status is readable*
The properties same as a toggle, and the difference is logic only (if that status is readable or not).

Roller.description:
A roller switch status.
A roller is a switch for curtains or blinds (or for any other needs) that can drag up/down or stop.

Cleaner.description:
A Cleaner (robot) status.
Cleaner is a smart robot for cleaning home.

Light.description:
A simple light status.
Used to devices that can chang it's brightness.

TemperatureLight.description:
A light simple light status.
Used to devices that can chang also light temperature (warm or cold light).

temperature.description: Spectrum is 1% to warm light and 100% to cold light.

ColorLight.description:
A light simple light status.
Used to devices that can change also light color (RGB).

temperature.description: Spectrum is 1% to warm light and 100% to cold light.

red.description:
Minimum 0 maximum 255 from red color.
Valid color value. (8 bits number, minimum 0 maximum 255).

green.description:
Minimum 0 maximum 255 from green color.
Valid color value. (8 bits number, minimum 0 maximum 255).

blue.description:
Minimum 0 maximum 255 from blue color.
Valid color value. (8 bits number, minimum 0 maximum 255).

MinionStatus.description: Minion status, the available values depend on the minion type.

ActionSet.description: The action set to do on an action trigger

setStatus.description: The status to set to the minion

ActionApply.description:
The triggers types.
- 'statusChange' to invoke only on status change, but allow change later the status
- 'permanent' at while the status of the minion of action trigger still on the triggered status, force the action, always.

Action.description: An action to trigger some minion/s status in case minion has some status

minionId.description: The minion where his status will trigger this action set

name.description: Free text, as the action name

ifStatus.description: The minion status that will trigger this action set

thenSet.description: The actions set to invoke in case of this action trigger

apply.description: The trigger to apply the action

localServerId.description: Optional for remote request forwards only
Optional for remote request forwards only

itemId.description: The item id, can be minion, timing, device etc

Collection.description: An collection of items, can be used for view aggregation of any item/s in the system

collectionName.description: The trigger to apply the action

battery.description: The battery power, if relevant, in %.

charging.description: Is the device in charging mode

LocalNetworkDevice.description: Represents any physical device in a local network.

mac.description: The MAC address of the device, the value is unique to each device.

ip.description: The device IP address, if exist it should be unique in network.

deviceStatus.description: The physical devices status, such as internal temp, battery etc.

DeviceKind.description: For each supported device, there are limitations and abilities of it.

brand.description: The brand of the current minion type. (see device model).

model.description: The specific model of minion type. (see device model).

minionsPerDevice.description:
The max minions that can be in one device, or -1 if unlimited.
For example, a simple smart socket can be 1 minion per device,
Wall switch with 3 switches can be 3 minions per device,
And IR transmitter can be unlimited minions per device.

isTokenRequired.description: Is the device require a token for communication API.

isIdRequired.description: Is device require id for communication API.

supportedMinionType.description: Supported minion type for the current device.

isRecordingSupported.description: Some of the devices supported recording (for example IR transmitter).

isFetchCommandsAvailable.description:
Whenever the device and module supported fetching commands data from 
the https://github.com/casanet/rf-commands-repo project

MinionDevice.description: Represents a physical device kind with network info.

model.description: The specific model of the device.

token.description: Some devices require a token for communication API.

deviceId.description: Some devices require id for communication API.

MinionCalibrate.description: Used to change the minion calibration property value.

calibrationCycleMinutes.description: Minutes to calibrate status, set 0 to turn off calibration

restrictionType.description: The limited access type to grant user

Minion.description:
Represents a minion in system.
Minion is a logic device in the system, meaning that a device is a physical device and minion is a logic device
that uses a physical device to switch home kit status. For example, an IR transmitter can be one physical device
for a few minions, one to central AC control and second for secondary AC control
so in it will be two totally different minions that use one physical device.

name.description: The display name for a minion.

isProperlyCommunicated.description: Is communication with device status ok.

minionStatus.description: Status of minion (based on minion type).

minionAutoTurnOffMS.description:
Auto turns  off duration, *if* set member value then the minion will turn off in X ms after turning it on,
Used for example in boiler minion etc.

calibration.description:
Calibrate the physical device with the server known status, in a periodic cycle,
and allow locking the status.

room.description: Represents the room where the minion is located at.

statusChangedTime.description: Last status change timestamp in UTC MS

restrictions.description: The restriction of access on this minion

AuthScopes.description:
Scopes of authentication, right know in our system there are only 3 scopes.
admin and user. any API route protect by one of them.

User.description: Represents a user in the system.

ignoreTfa.description: Ignore 2-step verification on login or not.

passwordChangeRequired.description: Whenever the user required to set new password, during default password usage, password expiration, etc.

DailySunTrigger.description: Daily timing based on sun triggers.

durationMinutes.description:
Minutes from the sun trigger.
can be before or after the sun triggers.
For example, to invoke 40 minutes before sunset set -40 and to invoke 40 minutes after sunset set 40.

NOTE! if the duration is more then minutes available in the day from the sun trigger time, the timing will not activate.
for example if the sunset is in 18:00 and the duration set to 7*60 minutes,
the activate time is not on the same day, so it will not activate at all.

DailyTimeTrigger.description: Daily timing based on time in a day.

durationInMinutes.description: Duration to activate timing from the start timeout time in minutes.

TimingProperties.description: Timing properties, values depend on timing type.

Timing.description: Represents a timing in the system.

triggerDirectAction.description: Allow (optional) to trigger (only) one minion directly

setLock.description: Lock the status that changed by the timing (default false)

OperationResult.description: Operation result s, hold set minion status result per minion.

error.description: Set a minion status results. (undefined if sets successfully).

SetMinionAutoTurnOff.description: Used to change the minion auto turn off the timeout value.

setAutoTurnOffMS.description: The timeout duration in ms, to turn off set 0 as valse.

MinionSetRoomName.description: Used to set minion room name.

room.description: The new room name to set.

MinionSetDevice.description: Used to set minion physical device.

Operation.description:
Represents an operation in the system.
An operation is a set of activities to do.
For example, to turn on all home light operation
sets an array of activity for each light in the home to set light status 'on'.

CommandsRepoDevice.description: Device in commands repo project. see https://github.com/casanet/rf-commands-repo. API section

RemoteConnectionStatus.description: Optional status on a remote connection

host.description: hostname / IP of the remote server

connectionKey.description: Access key for authorization local server in the remote server

blockLogsFetchByRemote.description: Prevent remote server from feting logs

code.description: Generated code that sent to user email account

alreadyUpToDate.description: Application already in the latest version

timestamp.description: Time stamp of HEAD commit in UTC format

post.description: Recheck minion device status (update server status cache).

Recheck every minion device status (update server status cache).
Note that this is not the devices scan!
This scanning only checks every minion API to know the current status.

Record a command (IR, 433-RF or any other supported RF tech)

Generate a command (IR, 433-RF or any other supported RF tech)
